item.title: Squashing conceptual bugs when computational bugs have been exterminated
item.description: CW22 - 2022-04-04 Collaborative Ideas session group: C-Clover Participants Aman Goel, University of Delhi, aman.goel185@gmail.com Juncheng E, European XFEL, juncheng.e@xfel.eu Iain Barrass, Queen Mary University of London, i.barrass@qmul.ac.uk Jesper Dramsch, ECMWF, jesper@dramsch.net Eli Chadwick, STFC, eli.chadwick@stfc.ac.uk Jiada Tu, Durham University, jiada.tu@durham.ac.uk Group photo Collaborative Idea Title Squashing conceptual bugs when computational bugs have been exterminated Context / Research Domain In physics the theory behind the code is as complex as writing the code itself.
